title: Are Democrats Blowing It With Latino Voters?
description:
Democratic operatives who specialize in Latino voter outreach are sounding the alarm: The Biden campaign assumes Latino support at its own peril. 
Guest: Chuck Rocha, head of Nuestro PAC.  
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: It shouldn’t be hard for Biden to get Latino voters’ support. He just has to ask them.
